Sys::Dbug Class Referenceabstract
Inheritance diagram for Sys::Dbug:

Documentation

This is an abstract peripheral character class that can be used for debugging. For an example see: DbugUart

Public Member Functions

void setmode (Dbug::mode mode, int width=0)

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Sys::Dbug::mode

Output Modes.

Enumerator
BINARY 

Binary mode

OCTAL 

Octal mode

hexadecimal 

Hexadecimal mode (lowercase)

HEXADECIMAL 

Hexadecimal mode (uppercase)

DECIMAL 

Decimal mode (Default); used exclusively by signed types
